Literature.Title: A peptide derived from phage display library exhibits antibacterial activity against E. coli and Pseudomonas aeruginosa.
Literature.Author: Sainath Rao S, Mohan KV, Atreya CD

Literature.Title: Outer-membrane-acting peptides and lipid II-targeting antibiotics cooperatively kill Gram-negative pathogens.
Literature.Author: Li Q, Cebrián R, Montalbán-López M, Ren H, Wu W, Kuipers OP

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>128-256µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 35548(MIC=>128-256µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 35983(MIC=64µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 700928(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 12121(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC=32-64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13885(MIC=32-64µg/ml),Escherichia coli LMG 15862(MIC=64µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae LMG 20218(MIC=>256µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa LMG 6395(MIC=>128µM),Acinetobacter baumannii LMG 01041(MIC=>128µM),Klebsiella aerogenes LMG 02094(MIC=>256µM)
